title: Czech Ladies Open
text:
The Czech Ladies Open is a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Ladies%20European%20Tour">Ladies European Tour</a>, first played in <a href="2019%20Ladies%20European%20Tour">2019</a>.
The tournament is played in <a href="Beroun">Beroun</a> just outside <a href="Prague">Prague</a>, <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech Republic</a>. In 2019 at Golf Course Karlštejn, overlooked by <a href="Karl%C5%A1tejn">Karlštejn Castle</a> and host to the <a href="1997%20European%20Tour">1997</a> <a href="Czech%20Open%20%28golf%29">Czech Open</a>, in 2020 at nearby Golf Club Beroun. For the <a href="2019%20LET%20Access%20Series">2019</a> season it became the second dual ranking event with LET on the <a href="LET%20Access%20Series">LET Access Series</a>, after the <a href="Jabra%20Ladies%20Open">Jabra Ladies Open</a>.
